!Asamah Oh yes, it's very good weapon against Tyrannosaurus. There are 3 skills to use against the beast: *Kabokula* - Used when trapping a roaring Tyrannosaurus (From 100% to 65% HP) *Tapirawa* - Used on a quivering Tyrannosaurus (From 65% to 25% HP) *Shabonoba* - Used on a struggling Tyrannosaurus (From 25% to death) [Quest _111_ElrokianHuntersProof asamah_q111_8.htm|"Understood, thank you very much."]
